title: AWS Security Governance to Azure Security Management: Enterprise Security Strategy and Compliance Automation
description: Master enterprise security governance and management by implementing comprehensive AWS security strategy and compliance frameworks, then migrating to Azure security management equivalents with advanced governance automation, risk management, and enterprise-grade security operations.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive security governance and enterprise risk management
Build security policy automation and compliance management frameworks
Create security strategy and organizational security management
Design security metrics and continuous security improvement programs
Implement security training and awareness management systems
Build security audit and regulatory compliance automation capabilities
prerequisites: Completion of all previous SCS-C02 labs or equivalent security experience
Strong understanding of security governance frameworks and compliance requirements
Experience with enterprise risk management and security strategy development
Familiarity with regulatory frameworks and security audit procedures
businessScenario: Governance Security Solutions provides enterprise security governance and compliance management services for global organizations requiring comprehensive risk management, regulatory compliance, and strategic security operations. Their security governance team needs expertise in policy automation, compliance frameworks, risk management, and security strategy. They must master both AWS and Azure governance platforms for comprehensive security management excellence.

troubleshooting.issue: Security policy complexity and multi-account governance challenges
troubleshooting.solution: Implement hierarchical policy inheritance, use policy templates and standardization, implement automated policy testing and validation, use role-based policy management, and implement policy impact analysis before deployment

troubleshooting.issue: Compliance automation complexity and regulatory framework alignment
troubleshooting.solution: Implement modular compliance frameworks, use automated compliance mapping, implement continuous compliance monitoring, use risk-based compliance prioritization, and implement compliance framework version management

troubleshooting.issue: Security governance metrics accuracy and executive reporting effectiveness
troubleshooting.solution: Implement standardized security metrics frameworks, use automated data collection and validation, implement trend analysis and predictive metrics, use executive-friendly dashboards and reporting, and implement metrics accuracy validation
